DOC.brief_summary: This is a study to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics, and pharmacodynamics of MOA-728 in subjects on stable methadone maintenance.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating MOA-728 in Subjects on Stable Methadone Maintenance
